title: Education on Utilizing Self-Reflection Tools for Strengthening Religious Character

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of religious concepts and foundational knowledge of character education
context.additional_context: Conducted through a combination of self-reflection activities via online platforms and face-to-face workshops

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain at least five key components of religious character.
Learners can use digital reflection tools to analyze their religious character strengths and weaknesses and write a report.
Learners can establish a personalized religious character development plan and set implementation stages based on reflection results.
Learners can evaluate the validity of reflection tool results with 80% or higher agreement through peer feedback.

resources: Web Platform Embedding Religious Character Assessment Algorithm
Space and Equipment for Face-to-Face Workshops

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
